org.apache.catalina.servlet4preview.http

接口 ServletMapping


  • public interface ServletMapping
    Represents how the request from which this object was obtained was mapped to the associated servlet.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.0

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MappingMatch getMappingMatch() 
      String getMatchValue() 
      String getPattern() 
      String getServletName() 

    • 方法详细资料

      • getMatchValue

        String getMatchValue()
        返回:
        The value that was matched or the empty String if not known.

      • getPattern

        String getPattern()
        返回:
        The url-pattern that matched this request or the empty String if not known.

      • getMappingMatch

        MappingMatch getMappingMatch()
        返回:
        The type of match (MappingMatch.UNKNOWN if not known)

      • getServletName

        String getServletName()
        返回:
        The name of the servlet (as specified in web.xml, WebServlet.name(), ServletContext.addServlet(String, Class) or one of the other addServlet() methods) that the request was mapped to.
